message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $170 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your suggestion, but I am only able to pay up to $120 for it. Would you consider accepting this offer?
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $120 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $145?
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I understand your position, but I believe $120 is still a reasonable price for this product. Could we meet halfway at $132.50?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While $132.50 is closer to what I had in mind, I'm still looking for a bit more. Would you be willing to do $138?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I will consider it, but I am still unable to go above $132.50. Would $135 be acceptable to you?
